item.description:
Learn about all the advanced levels of the Enneagram - instinctual subtypes and subtype stacking, wings, stress and secure points, centers, tritypes, sequences, parental types, and all the subtleties of the Enneagram beyond just the basics!

2:00 pm - 6:00 pm

($50 - Basic and Advanced together is $75 )


Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is a leading expert on Personality Types and the Enneagram, having taught 2000 Enneagram workshops in over 20 years. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram (which you can purchase from him), is a therapist for individuals, couples, and families who specializes in enhancing relationship satisfaction through understanding and better communication regarding personality differences. He does phone sessions and leads trainings for groups, organizations and companies.

www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Enneagram Advanced Workshop
